fields.name: backgroundColor
fields.desc: The background color of the [Material] that holds the [NavigationDrawer]'s contents.

fields.name: shadowColor
fields.desc: The color used for the drop shadow to indicate elevation.

fields.name: surfaceTintColor
fields.desc: The surface tint of the [Material] that holds the [NavigationDrawer]'s contents.

fields.name: indicatorColor
fields.desc: The color of the [indicatorShape] when this destination is selected.

fields.name: indicatorShape
fields.desc: The shape of the selected indicator.

fields.name: children
fields.desc: Defines the appearance of the items within the navigation drawer.

fields.name: selectedIndex
fields.desc: The index into destinations for the current selected [NavigationDrawerDestination] or null if no destination is selected.

fields.name: onDestinationSelected
fields.desc: Called when one of the [NavigationDrawerDestination] children is selected.

fields.name: tilePadding
fields.desc: Defines the padding for [NavigationDrawerDestination] widgets (Drawer items).
